channel.title: Still need help, the 1 comment didn't help!
channel.description:
My cmd of the runserver says this when I logged onto my account [code]Archaic 317 initializing... Loading NPC's... Loading Objects... Loading Mapdata... Archaic 317 initialized!
Connection from 127.0.0.1:58711 For input string: "0 1037 1" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "0 1037 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.loadgame(client.java:9294) at client.run(client.java:16801) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Game saved for player Knight ClientHandler: Client Knight disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:58712 For input string: "0 0 0" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "0 0 0" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.loadgame(client.java:9294) at client.run(client.java:16801) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Game saved for player Knight ClientHandler: Client Knight disconnected (127.0.0.1) [/code]
It reseted my characters once I logged onto them... :| Anyone know what this could be?

item.title: Still need help, the 1 comment didn't help!
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

Duh fuq…
There’s something wrong with the loading, try ripping it from another source?
Because I know nothing about 317…

  • I’ve never seen an error like that :B

Read full topic
item.source: Still need help, the 1 comment didn't help!

item.title: Still need help, the 1 comment didn't help!
item.dc:creator: @dawwn dawwn
item.description:
@dawwn wrote:

My cmd of the runserver says this when I logged onto my account

[code]Archaic 317 initializing…
Loading NPC’s…
Loading Objects…
Loading Mapdata…
Archaic 317 initialized!

Connection from 127.0.0.1:58711
For input string: “0 1037 1”
java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “0 1037 1”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at client.loadgame(client.java:9294)
at client.run(client.java:16801)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Game saved for player Knight
ClientHandler: Client Knight disconnected (127.0.0.1)
Connection from 127.0.0.1:58712
For input string: “0 0 0”
java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “0 0 0”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at client.loadgame(client.java:9294)
at client.run(client.java:16801)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Game saved for player Knight
ClientHandler: Client Knight disconnected (127.0.0.1)
[/code]

It reseted my characters once I logged onto them… Anyone know what this could be?

Read full topic
